strings.Value: "That Remus... He's not as simple as he looks. I'm not sure why, but I just look at him and know something is wrong."
"I didn't know you had such keen eyesight. But yes, I believe you're right."
"At his age, fear of death drives many to madness. Although I cannot say that Remus truly understands what death really means..."
"I saw something sad in his eyes... no, maybe it was something sly... or was it mysterious? Oh, don't listen to me. I'm just confused."
